name: Stupid Pet Tricks Game Pack 2.0
description:
This package was made for the Stupid Pet Tricks joystick hardware. It contains the following:

Cosmic Raiders - Space Invaders for 80 column PETs
Supports keyboard and joystick
Author: Derek Hipkin

Acrobat - for 3000 series PET's
Note: first life seems to be invisible until you die. Original game issue. Also this works only with joystick, no keyboard option. 
Author: Commodore Japan 

Super Glooper - Pac Man for the 3000 series PET's - Forced Joystick version, no keyboard
Author: D.E. Anthony

Candy Man - Pac-Man for the 3xxx and 4xxx PET's
Supports keyboard and joystick
Author: Kevin Pickell
